Name: KYC Submitted
Subject: We’ve received your identity documents
HtmlBody:
Hi {{first_name}},

Thanks — we’ve received your documents and are now reviewing your identity verification.

We’ll let you know as soon as your account is fully verified.

You can check your status here:
View my status

Once you're verified, you’ll be able to receive post and manage everything directly from your dashboard.

If you have any questions, feel free to reply to this email.

— The VirtualAddressHub Team
TextBody:
Hi {{first_name}},

Thanks — we’ve received your documents and are now reviewing your identity verification.

We’ll let you know as soon as your account is fully verified.

You can check your status here: {{dashboard_link}}

Once you're verified, you’ll be able to receive post and manage everything directly from your dashboard.

If you have any questions, feel free to reply to this email.

— The VirtualAddressHub Team
